ibis.ipl

Interface RegistryEventHandler


  • public interface RegistryEventHandler
    Describes the upcalls that are generated for the Ibis group management of a pool. At most one of the methods in this interface will be active at any time (they are serialized by ibis). These upcalls must be explicitly enabled, by means of the Registry.enableEvents() method. The following also holds:
    - For any given Ibis identifier, at most one joined() call will be generated.
    - For any given Ibis identifier, at most one left() call will be generated.
    - An Ibis instance will also receive a joined() upcall for itself.

    If the IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_TOTALLY_ORDERED is specified for this Ibis, all Ibis instances receive all joined(), left(), and died(), upcalls in exactly the same order.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void died(IbisIdentifier corpse)
      Upcall generated when an Ibis instance crashed or was killed, implicitly removing it from the pool.
      void electionResult(java.lang.String electionName, IbisIdentifier winner)
      Upcall generated when a new result for an election is available.
      void gotSignal(java.lang.String signal, IbisIdentifier source)
      Upcall generated when one or more Ibisses are sent a signal.
      void joined(IbisIdentifier joinedIbis)
      Upcall generated when an Ibis instance joined the pool.
      void left(IbisIdentifier leftIbis)
      Upcall generated when an Ibis instance voluntarily left the pool.
      void poolClosed()
      Upcall generated when a pool closes.
      void poolTerminated(IbisIdentifier source)
      Upcall generated when a pool terminates.

    • Method Detail

      • joined

        void joined(IbisIdentifier joinedIbis)
        Upcall generated when an Ibis instance joined the pool. Note: an Ibis instance may also receive a joined upcall for itself. If the IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_TOTALLY_ORDERED is specified for this Ibis, all Ibis instances receive the joined upcalls in the same order. If IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_UNRELIABLE is specified, some Ibis instances may be missed, and the order of the upcalls may not be the same.
        Parameters:
        joinedIbis - the ibis identifier of the Ibis instance that joined the pool.

      • left

        void left(IbisIdentifier leftIbis)
        Upcall generated when an Ibis instance voluntarily left the pool. If the IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_TOTALLY_ORDERED is specified for this Ibis, all Ibis instances receive the left upcalls in the same order. If IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_UNRELIABLE is specified, some Ibis instances may be missed, and the order of the upcalls may not be the same.
        Parameters:
        leftIbis - the ibis identifier of the Ibis instance that left the pool.

      • died

        void died(IbisIdentifier corpse)
        Upcall generated when an Ibis instance crashed or was killed, implicitly removing it from the pool. If the IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_TOTALLY_ORDERED is specified for this Ibis, all Ibis instances receive the died upcalls in the same order. If IbisCapabilities.MEMBERSHIP_UNRELIABLE is specified, some Ibis instances may be missed, and the order of the upcalls may not be the same.
        Parameters:
        corpse - the ibis identifier of the dead Ibis instance.

      • gotSignal

        void gotSignal(java.lang.String signal,
               IbisIdentifier source)
        Upcall generated when one or more Ibisses are sent a signal. This call can only be the result of a Registry.signal(String, IbisIdentifier...) call. It is always the result of a call by the application. How the receiver of this upcall reacts to this is up to the application.
        Parameters:
        signal - the value of the signal supplied by the user.
        source - the sender of the signal.
        Ibis.experimental:

      • electionResult

        void electionResult(java.lang.String electionName,
                    IbisIdentifier winner)
        Upcall generated when a new result for an election is available.
        Parameters:
        electionName - the name of the election.
        winner - the winner of the election. This parameter may be null if the previous winner of an election died or left.

      • poolClosed

        void poolClosed()
        Upcall generated when a pool closes.

      • poolTerminated

        void poolTerminated(IbisIdentifier source)
        Upcall generated when a pool terminates.
        Parameters:
        source - Ibis which terminated the pool.
        Ibis.experimental:
